original: 呂布麾下猛將，以驍勇聞名。曾隨呂布討張燕。曹操平定呂布的時候，被曹軍俘虜，之後再無記載。《三國演義》中稱其為呂布八健將之一，被樂進射殺。
text: Lu Bu's commander is a fierce general, known for his bravery. Zeng followed Lu Bu to discuss Zhang Yan. Cao Cao was captured by the Cao army when he put down Lu Bu, and there was no record after that. In The Romance of the Three Kingdoms, he was named one of the eight great generals of Lu Bu and was shot and killed by Lejin.
